main event: Unidentified flying object sighted over Osan Air Force Base in Korea on September 14, 1961.
interesting points: The object changed colors from white to reddish, possibly due to atmospheric conditions., Witnesses reported the object moving erratically at a high altitude and making rapid altitude changes., The sighting lasted approximately 12 minutes., Radar could not track the object, suggesting it was not a conventional target., Investigators concluded it was probably a balloon based on the lack of sound and conventional aircraft characteristics.
